title: Airport this way! Moroccan fan to the Spanish soccer team

author: Pele_Maradona_Messi
text: I was rooting for Morocco (on their side of the bracket) until I saw how arrogant and obnoxious their fans became. Fuck them now, I hope Portugal or France curbstomps them lol

author: pirateking2502
text: You'll find such fans for every team. Never the team's fault.

author: cmonfamm
text: Also considering the history between the two countries this is an insane win for Morocco

author: HoeDontBelieveYou
text: Stop lying you never rooted for Morocco, can't believe you think this joke video was arrogant, literally get a grip buddy, I bet you were shaking and crying too

author: Pele_Maradona_Messi
text: Huh? I wanted Morocco to win so Argentina could have an easy final. The I saw all these obnoxious videos and riots show up, and that's when I said screw them, I hope they lose now, even if Argentina has to face France. Nice try buddy, go flip some cars in Belgium.

author: HoeDontBelieveYou
text: Honestly now I know why everyone in South American hates the Argentinains ðŸ’€ arrogant and racist assholes

author: badvladthelad
text: Mate, nothing he said is racist

author: [deleted]
text: People of Morrocco and the country deserve it. Every teams fan will get like this. Never forget where you came from and always root for the little guy

author: Pele_Maradona_Messi
text: Nobody deserves anything. You have to earn it. Morocco has not earned the arrogance their fans are exuding. What they will earn is an ass kicking in the later rounds lol.

author: HoeDontBelieveYou
text:
"I was gonna tell Germany too, but the plane back to Berlin already left."

You literally made the same joke as the kid a few days ago. ðŸ’€ Guess you deserve an ass kicking in the future

author: Pele_Maradona_Messi
text: Not to the German players. That's banter between fans. Thanks for going through my comment history, you clearly have nothing better to do!

author: Pele_Maradona_Messi
text: You right, I don't watch soccer, I watch football. Fans do act like that, but I've never seen them act like that to players and blast it all over social media. Nice try guy!

author: Typical_Notice6083
text: That is football,small country won strong team of course they would feel all fierce at that moment
